detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, rib-knit organic cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Triangular earrings in metal with sparkly stone chain tassels. Length 14 cm.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar and V-neck opening with ties at the top. Long raglan balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a skirt with seams. Lined.
Short skirt in lightweight, fast-drying functional fabric with short inner tights. The skirt has an elasticated waist and pleats for added mobility and a laser-cut hem.
Leather Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Ski gloves in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reinforced palms. Elastication and hook and loop tab at the wrists and soft inner ribbing at the top. Thinsulate™ lining.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and long sleeves. Open chest pocket and a straight-cut hem.
Boxy-style jumper in a jacquard knit with a soft, brushed finish. Long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Small bag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with an adjustable shoulder strap and flap with a magnetic fastener and decorative metal ring. Lined. Size 6x14x19 cm.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Leggings in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Rib-knit joggers with a lightly brushed finish and an elasticated drawstring waist.
Top in washed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and deep armholes in a wide style with a decorative seam at the back. Raw-edge, rounded hem that is short at the front and longer at the back.
Short yoga top in fast-drying functional fabric. Wrapover front with an opening at the top, open section at the back, long sleeves and gathers in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Metal earrings. Length approx. 6 cm.
Large elasticated scrunchies in sheer organza. Diameter approx. 15 cm.

Calf-length, V-neck dress in plumeti chiffon with flounces. Wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the neckline, long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and skirt with a sewn-in wrapover. Partly lined.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in woven fabric with an elasticated waist. Lined.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a knot detail.
Joggers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and flared hems.
Lightweight, padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and narrow elastication around the hood and cuffs.
Gently fitted shirt in cotton poplin with a pointed collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Hat in felted wool with a band. Width of brim approx. 7 cm.
T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend with short raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Short dress in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck with lacing. Frill trim over the shoulders, short sleeves with frill trims and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Unlined.
Long-sleeved shirt in a woven cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins), seam at the waist and flared skirt.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly with a press-stud, and tapered legs.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Sarong in patterned satin with long ties at the top.

Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with fake front pockets, real back pockets and tapered legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Lined bandeau bikini top with padded cups with removable inserts, narrow tie-top shoulder straps, side support and straps that tie at the back.
Short, A-line skirt in imitation suede with buttons down the front and a frill trim at the top. Lined.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Short-sleeved dress in soft jersey with a seam and drawstring at the waist.
Ribbed hat in a soft cotton blend with a decorative faux fur pompom on top and a turn-up hem with a small fabric appliqué.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft washed cotton twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Long-sleeved tops in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short, sleeveless dress in textured jersey with a V-neck and wrapover front and back. Frill trims around the armholes, at the neckline and at the back. Ties at the back of the neck and a seam at the waist with smocking at the back. Unlined.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in a jacquard weave with notch lapels and concealed pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Shirt in soft washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Body in soft, stretch, seamless fabric in a straight cut at the top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and a string back. The body is designed with a minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Knee-length dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neck, short sleeves and an elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist.
Shirt in a linen and cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem.
Vest top in airy slub linen jersey with a racer back and rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbed trim around the neckline.
Romper suit in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Narrow ribbing around the neckline, press-studs at the shoulders and crotch, and short sleeves and short legs, both with sewn-in turn-ups.
Knee-length shorts in wide wale cotton corduroy with a button fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in a crinkled organic cotton weave with a frill-trimmed collar, buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with an all-over print. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Padded, quilted jacket in cotton corduroy with a pile-lined stand-up collar, zip down the front, front pockets with a press-stud and an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Elastication and a press-stud at the cuffs and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with short kimono sleeves, slits in the sides and no buttons.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a reversible sequin motif (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Wide, high-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a detachable tie belt, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Pleats at the top that create a draped effect, pockets in the side seams, fake back pockets and wide, straight-cut legs.
Pointelle-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Short, A-line dress in soft cotton denim with a V-shaped opening and ties at the neckline. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with narrow cuffs and a covered button, and seams with decorative gathers for added volume at the hem. Unlined. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.
Set in a soft fine knit consisting of gloves, a hat and a scarf. Length of scarf 26x180 cm.

Suit trousers in a linen weave with an extended waistband with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to created a fitted silhouette.
Fabric cap with elastication at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Oversized top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Boxer shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated waist and fake fly.
Fully lined swimsuit with flounces at the top that go over the shoulder straps and continue down the back. Inset panel at the waist.
Scarf in a soft, loose weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 100x200 cm.

Set in soft sweatshirt fabric with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers. Boxy-style top with dropped shoulders, an embroidered detail at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless, fitted, calf-length dress in stretch cotton twill with wide shoulder straps, off-centre buttons down the front and a seam at the waist.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and moulded, padded cups that lift and shape while providing good support. Elasticated hem and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes. Medium support.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a regular waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
